title: The Movement of water inside and outside the fascicle = Faszikulare und extrafaszikulare wasserleitung
creator_contributor_role: Institut für Film und Bild, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Biology - Study and teaching
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Plant-water relationships
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Plant physiology
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Biology - Study and teaching
description: The movement of water in plants is demonstrated using fluorescent solutions and time-lapse photographic techniques. Solutions absorbed into the plants formed an illuminated network of leaf structure which was photographed. The movement of liquid is demonstrated in the leaves, young twigs and stems of different types of plants. In German only.
